conformance.storage

Class StorageTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.Test
      • conformance.storage.StorageTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessTest, DirectoryTest, RegistrationTest

    abstract class StorageTest
extends Test
    Base class for storage server tests.

    This class takes care of creating a temporary directory for the storage server to serve and starting a test naming server on startup, and removing the directory and stopping the servers on exit.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Temporary directory served by the storage server.

      Testing naming server.

      Naming server registration service.

      Storage server being tested.
      private String[][] test_files
      Files to be created in the storage server temporary directory.
